This anthology gathers the first anticipation stories of the author of Code Name: Love City (Ai city), whose title was adapted into an animated film in 1986. The book opens with the character of Rick, an investigator living in the underbelly of a technologically advanced city. His mission: to unravel the mysteries surrounding the murder of a scientist whose corpse was found intact in his locked car... The book then plunges the reader into a universe where virtual reality and transhumanism are the law: humanity seems to have grown tired of its condition. Lost in its daydreams, it started to develop new tools of distraction. Imaginary worlds in which it is possible to give free rein to its fantasies, like raising an army to go to war against extraterrestrial life forms.","fr":"Découvrez six histoires courtes à la mode cyberpunk du maître Shûhô Itahashi, composées entre 1981 et 1984. L’ouvrage s’ouvre sur le personnage de Rick, un enquêteur installé dans les bas-fonds d’une ville à la technologie avancée. Sa mission : démêler les mystères entourant le meurtre d’un scientifique dont le cadavre a été retrouvé intact dans son véhicule fermé à clé... L’ouvrage plonge ensuite le lecteur dans un univers où réalité virtuelle et transhumanisme font loi : l’humanité semble s’être lassée de sa condition. Perdue dans ses rêveries, elle s’est mise à développer de nouveaux outils de distraction. Des mondes imaginaires dans lesquels il lui est possible de laisser libre cours à ses fantasmes, comme de lever une armée pour partir en guerre contre des formes de vie extraterrestres."},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}}]}

18ac6c02-fc98-4b36-be68-4ce94a2f48c5:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"18ac6c02-fc98-4b36-be68-4ce94a2f48c5","title":{"en":"Gunshot"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"銃声"},{"ja-ro":"Jūsei"}],"lastChapter":"11","description":{"en":"This is a collection of 11 short manga by Katsuhiro Otomo, who was 17-19 years old and still a minor, between 1971 and 1974, from the period when he was a student contributor to his professional debut.\n\nThe mangaka made his official debut at the age of just 19 with \"Gunshot\" in the August 4 supplementary issue of Weekly Manga Action in 1973, and none of his first seven short stories have been published in any previous tankobon. They are literally \"phantom early works\".\n\nThis compilation includes all of these works for the first time, as well as four completely unpublished manga, which were studies and submissions made before the Otomo's debut.\n\nIt is a miracle that the originals of these works still exist, but the mangaka's permission to include these unpublished works was also a special measure taken for the \"complete works\" project, and the realization of this release is truly a \"once in a half-century\" miracle.\n\nIt is up to the reader to decide whether to dismiss it as a collection of crude, poor, immature works or to be horrified by the expression of a \"terrible child\" with fresh sensibility and a maturity that is hard to believe for a teenage boy. \n\nThe value of this tankobon is immeasurable as a \"one-of-a-kind record\" that shows the moment when a creator who would later make a name for himself in the world was born, as well as the moments before and after.\n\nOnly 10 years after his debut, in 1983, the still unknown \"monster\" began to make \"AKIRA\". Finally! They are now being brought back to life!\n\n---\nContains:\n- **The Sea...** (海が..., Umi ga...)\n- **Battlefield - Study Work** (戦場 - 習作, Senjou - Shusaku) - A silent one-shot.\n- **The Little Match Girl** (まっちうりの少女, Match Uri no Shoujo) - Adaptation of The Little Match Girl set in the United States, having the girl be African American.\n- **Louise**  (ルイーズ) - Adaptation of the story by W. Somerset Maugham.\n- **Gunshot** (銃声, Jusei) - Adaptation of Prosper Mérimée's Mateo Falcone. Otomo's pro debut.\n- **Good Friend** (親友, Shinyu) - Adaptation of the story William Wilson by Edgar Allan Poe.\n- **Old Man Smiley** (スマイリーおじさん, Smiley-ojisan) - Adaptation of the short story The Celebrated Jumping Frog of Calaveras County by Mark Twain.\n- **The Bridge, And...** (橋と そして..., Hashi to Soshite...)\n- **Where do the Children Go...?** (子供たちは何処へ…, Kodomotachi wa Doko e....)\n- **Shanghai Wind** (上海かぜ, Shanghai Kaze) - Written by Yoshihiro Yamamoto, with art done by Otomo.\n- **Poaching Night** (密漁の夜, Mitsuryo no Yoru)\n\n\n**Volume 1 of the Katsuhiro Otomo Complete Works**"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/gp/product/4065273153/ref=dbs_a_def_rwt_hsch_vapi_taft_p1_i2?language=ja_JP","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-2871374"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0234a31e-a729-4e28-9d6a-3f87c4966b9e","name":{"en":"Oneshot"}},{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"3bb26d85-09d5-4d2e-880c-c34b974339e9","name":{"en":"Ghosts"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"97893a4c-12af-4dac-b6be-0dffb353568e","name":{"en":"Sexual Violence"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

Am Tag ihrer ungewollten Hochzeit, erwacht Winsty als Magierin, nachdem sie nach einer Vergiftung wieder zurück ins Leben geholt wird. Um die ständigen Angriffe von ihrer Cousine zu beenden, die das Oberhaupt der Familie sein will und Winsty und ihrer Familie Böses zugefügt hat, geht Winsty eine vertragliche Beziehung mit einem Herzog aus einer verfeindeten Familie ein. Indem sie sich wie eine Närrin verhält und somit eine Maske trägt, versucht Winsty, ihre Ehre und ihre Macht wiederherzustellen, und wird mit einer enormen Verschwörung konfrontiert, die bis hin zum Kaiser des Kaiserreichs geht.","en":"A magician pretending to be a fool in order to get revenge.\n\nOn the day of her unwanted wedding, Winsty awakens as a magician after being brought back to life from being poisoned.\n\nIn order to stop the constant attacks from her cousin who wants to be the head of the family and has done evil against Winsty and her parents, Winsty enters into a contractual relationship with a duke from a rival family.\n\nBehaving like a fool and wearing a mask, Winsty actively tries to regain honor and authority and comes face to face with an enormous conspiracy entwined with the empire's emperor.\n\n---\nEver since she was a child, Winsty has hidden the fact that she’s a wizard. Her parents warned her to wait to use her abilities because her power was too much, and when a tragedy resulted in her parents’ deaths, Winsty was convinced her use of magic was the reason. Vulnerable and weak, her cousin Adelina supports her throughout her life, often “exerting” herself as the “head” of the family in Winsty’s stead. So, when Winsty is poisoned on her wedding day by her cousin, the shock is enormous. But something brings Winsty back to the moment just before the wedding. To enact her revenge and take back what is hers, she will enter into a contractual relationship with a duke from a rival family. Her journey to take down Adelina and bring honor back to her family also reveals a conspiracy that goes all the way to the emperor.","es":"Una hechicera finge ser tonta para cobrar venganza. Agora estando fragilizada e abatida, Winsty é apoiada por sua prima Adelina, que passa a cuidar das atividades da família. Down on the surface, the cast-off waste of humanity has bred vicious monsters, and if Rudo wants to have any hope of discovering the truth and seeking vengeance against those who cast him into Hell, he will have to master a new power and join a group known as the Cleaners who battle the hulking trash beasts of the Pit! He sleeps with woman after woman, but none of them really does it for him. On top of that, he has a major crush on his boss, who only chides him for coming in late after his wild nights of unsatisfying sex and generally treats him as an errand boy. Then, one evening, a stranger accosts him at his apartment door.  \n  \n2: Ore no Shachou Boku no Hisho (My Boss, My Secretary)  \nAn inept president, an uptight secretary, a shady moneylender, and a fiscal crisis. Where will it all lead?  \n  \n3: Kairaku no Chi (Land Of Pleasure)  \nA business trip to a tropical paradise is interrupted by an offbeat tour guide and a shocking turn of events.  \n  \n4: Kou Mono (The Supplicant)  \nA husband and brother deal with the fallout of a life cut short.  \n  \n5: Ichiban no Ai (The Greatest Love)  \nFormer Section Chief Masaki considers it an honor to do his best in his temporary assignment as secretary to President Shirasaki. Watch as cat turns to mouse, mouse to cat, and see how two childhood friends tiptoe the boundaries of their relationship.\n\n---\n\n- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%97%9C%E4%BF%82%E6%8C%87%E5%8D%97/127)\n\n- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/72869)\n\n- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81/90)","ja":"「私たちもやってみる？キス」 掴み所のない幼馴染みの光（ひかる）と何気なくキスをした結衣（ゆい）。 あれから光のことが気になって仕方ないのに、光は変わらない態度。 「私たちの関係って、一体何！？」 幼馴染み、クラスメイト、親友、どうでもいい人？ それとも… 曖昧なことが大嫌いな結衣が、光の心の内を読み解こうと全身全霊で挑むハイスクールラブコメディ！\n\n---\n\n- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%97%9C%E4%BF%82%E6%8C%87%E5%8D%97/127)\n\n- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/72869)\n\n- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81/90)","ko":"호기심… 그게 문제였을까?\n아니면 그날의 키스가 문제였을까?\n\n알 수 없는 네 마음,\n네가 모르겠다면 내가 바로 세워 줄게.\n\n속을 알 수 없는 원인 제공자 명인과\n속이 훤히 보이는 결론 맺음자 지원의\n관계 바로 읽기, \u003c관계지침\u003e\n\n---\n\n- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%97%9C%E4%BF%82%E6%8C%87%E5%8D%97/127)\n\n- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/72869)\n\n- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81/90)","th":"ปัญหาของความสัมพันธ์ในตอนนี้ มันอยู่ที่จูบวันนั้นงั้นเหรอ? Cùng tồn tại với loài người là một số robot dạng hình người có trí thông minh. Lee Ruli, the person who has possessed the body of the kingdom's Tineke (a kind of white rose). She leaves the mansion in order to find a clue on how to her world. In a strange world with no one to trust… Will Ruli be able to go on a safe journey and get back home?\n\n---\n* [Original Webtoon \u003cLezhin\u003e](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/elegy)","id":"Pemeran utamanya adalah Iruri. Dia dipindahkan ke dunia lain melalui mimpi dan memiliki tubuh Tineke. Itu adalah bangsawan muda dari kerajaan. Dia mencoba meninggalkan mansion untuk mendapatkan petunjuk untuk kembali ke dunia nyata. Namun, di dunia yang aneh di mana Elma, gadis yang mengikuti Tineke, selalu berada dalam pikirannya, dan ia tidak memiliki siapa pun untuk dipercaya. Akankah Ruri dapat menyelesaikan perjalanannya dan pulang dengan selamat?\n\n---\n* [Original Webtoon \u003cLezhin\u003e](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/elegy)","ko":"꿈을 통해 다른 세계로 이끌려 와\n어느 왕국 귀족 영애, 티네케의 몸에 빙의하게 된 주인공, 이루리.\n현실 세계로 돌아가기 위한 단서를 얻고자 저택에서 떠나려 한다.\n\n하지만 티네케를 따르던 소녀, 엘마가 자꾸 눈에 밟히고\n믿을 사람 하나 없는 낯선 세계에서 루리는 무력하기만 한데…\n\n루리는 여정을 무사히 마치고 다시 집으로 돌아갈 수 있을까?\n\n---\n* [Original Webtoon \u003cLezhin\u003e](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/elegy)","zh":"主人公李露丽通过梦境穿越到了异世界，穿成了某个王国的贵族小姐阿尔贝蒂娜。她试图离开豪宅去寻找返回原世界的线索，然而在这个陌生的世界里，不断有人找自己的麻烦，没人可以信得过，李露丽很无奈......她还能安全地完成旅途并回家吗？\n\n---\n* [Original Webtoon \u003cLezhin\u003e](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/elegy)","zh-hk":"主人公李露麗通過夢境穿越到了異世界，穿成了某個王國的貴族小姐阿爾貝蒂娜。\n\n她試圖離開豪宅去尋找返回原世界的線索，然而在這個陌生的世界裡，不斷有人找自己的麻煩，沒人可以信得過，李露麗很無奈......她還能安全地完成旅途並回家嗎？\n\n---\n* [Original Webtoon \u003cLezhin\u003e](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/elegy)"},"links":{"al":"143116","ap":"elegy-of-rose-castle","mu":"n04iecf","raw":"https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/rose_elegy"},"originalLanguage":"ko","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

1abe9156-d1f0-4a51-a395-e0c57c30b9a2:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"1abe9156-d1f0-4a51-a395-e0c57c30b9a2","title":{"en":"Snow Ridge, Sword Dance"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Cliff of Snow"},{"en":"Sword Dance"},{"ja-ro":"Yuki no Touge Ken no Mai"},{"ja-ro":"Yuki no Touge Tsurugi no Mai"},{"ja":"雪の峠・剣の舞"},{"ja":"雪之崖.剑之舞"}],"lastChapter":"9","availableTranslatedLanguages":["fr","es","en"],"description":{"en":"The closing stages of Sengoku (Warring States) Japan. A setting commonly explored in Japanese manga through vivid scenes of gory battles, samurai, and feats of bravery, honour, and loyalty. IWAAKI Hitoshi dares to go against the popular grain by not focusing on the 3 famous unifiers, but by depicting stories of a society in transition. Rapidly changing cultural norms and class expectations pit the old versus the young, the war-weary versus the war-mongers, and the parochial versus the foward-thinking.  \n  \nThe first story, \"Snow Ridge\", explores the changing role of samurai and provinces while the second story, \"Sword Dance\", deals with kendo's early evolution from warfare to art.  \n  \nChapter 1-4: Snow Ridge  \nChapter 5-9: Sword Dance"},"links":{"al":"50557","ap":"yuki-no-touge-tsurugi-no-mai","kt":"9548","mal":"20557","mu":"28869"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

Và để cô ấy giữ bí mật, tôi phải làm theo những yêu cầu của cô ấy...\r\n\r\nCuộc sống Cao trung vốn vô vị và nhạt nhẽo của tôi đã trở nên nhộn nhịp khi làm quen với ba cô gái qua cô Hanazono――Rinko, một thiên tài piano có tính cách kì quái, Shizuki, một tay trống có sở thích cắm hoa, và Akane, một ca sĩ hay trốn học――Ba cô gái này đã khiến cuộc sống của tôi trở nên nhộn nhịp và tràn đầy rắc rồi.\r\n\r\nTình yêu, thanh xuân và ban nhạc, boy meets girls!","zh":"因为一时冲动穿上女装把演奏影片上传到网路上的我，以神秘的女高中生网路音乐家身分一举成名。本来想说没有露脸应该不会有问题，没想到被高中的音乐老师．华园美沙绪老师发现了真实身分，陷入被抓住弱点肆意使唤的窘境……\r\n　　我本该平淡无味的高中生活，因为透过华园老师认识的三位少女——个性扭曲的天才钢琴家凛子、花道的千金小姐鼓手诗月、拒绝上学的座敷童子主唱朱音——逐渐变得嘈杂而充满烦恼。\r\n　　埋首于恋爱、青春、乐团中的Boy Meets Girls！"},"links":{"al":"145934","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0BG4LT8BP","bw":"series/375988/list","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/searchuni?fq.category=UD:14\u0026q=楽園ノイズ\u0026order=reldesc\u0026opt.exclude_prx=on","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/721119/","mal":"148288","mu":"p1xy2uo","nu":"paradise-noise","raw":"https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF02202974010000_68/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f42fbf9e-188a-447b-9fdc-f19dc1e4d685","name":{"en":"Music"}}]}

Durante os 300 anos começou sua viagem de cultivação, e no momento em que estava prestes a alcançar o Reino da Eternidade, inesperadamente abriu um portal no espaço e tempo e acabou retornando para a terra, mas na idade quando ele tinha 17 anos. Quando Chu Qing se deu conta da situação, não era a terra que ele viveu uma vez, mas agora o mundo estava invertido no papel das mulheres e dos homens na sociedade. \"Mas o que está acontecendo? Agora as mulheres são total autoridade?\" Conheça como foi a viajem para ele encontrar o caminho de volta ao seu tempo original, e derrotar e conquistar as mulheres que são o poder absoluto neste novo mundo…"},"links":{"al":"116027","kt":"56113","mu":"5t35yvm","raw":"https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/645591"},"originalLanguage":"zh","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"aafb99c1-7f60-43fa-b75f-fc9502ce29c7","name":{"en":"Harem"}},{"id":"acc803a4-c95a-4c22-86fc-eb6b582d82a2","name":{"en":"Wuxia"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

Объединившись с ангелом по имени Крим, критики собирают информацию о сексуальных достоинствах всех видов живых существ этого мира, получая удовольствие от процесса и зарабатывая попутно дополнительные деньги."},"links":{"al":"101175","ap":"interspecies-reviewers","bw":"series/130019/list","kt":"50727","mal":"109408","mu":"kxmzsep","raw":"https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_FS01000047010000_68/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"dd1f77c5-dea9-4e2b-97ae-224af09caf99","name":{"en":"Monster Girls"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}
